algorithm_technique: Constructive algorithm with digit manipulation and greedy selection.
problem_summary_simple: Find the smallest integer greater than or equal to n with an equal count of even and odd digits.
problem_summary_technical: Constructs the smallest fair integer by modifying digits of n, prioritizing larger digits and filling remaining with smallest possible.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by constructing the number digit by digit.
A greedy approach works by trying to keep the prefix of the number as close to n as possible.
Handling carries and ensuring the fair condition requires careful digit manipulation.
